name: Overwhelmed (Ludipe)
description:
A short game by Ludipe with icons from iconos8.es, music by Abstraction, and sfx by sergeeo and minor.

A game made during Game Jam Madrid Crea. You can skip any level in the game (just check the help menu).

Some articles I checked while working on this game [1], [2], [3], and [4].
Pictures from the demonstration.
